rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A spacious entrance with eco-friendly lighting and energy-efficient design, ensuring natural ventilation. The layout supports Vastu principles by aligning the entry to enhance positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A large living area with sustainable materials, ample natural light through south-facing windows and eco-friendly fixtures. Vastu-compliant positioning ensures prosperity and harmony.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: An open dining space integrated with the living area, designed with energy-efficient design elements and natural ventilation. Vastu principles guide its placement for balanced energy flow.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern eco-friendly kitchen featuring energy-saving appliances, recycled materials, and optimal orientation (south-east) per Vastu guidelines to promote nourishment and positivity.

rooms.name: Servants Quarters
rooms.description: Dedicated space for house-help, designed with privacy in mind and sustainable ventilation. Positioned following Vastu norms to maintain a respectful energy balance.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A quiet, well-lit library area for reading and study, with eco-friendly fixtures and natural light. Its placement is carefully considered per Vastu principles to enhance concentration and knowledge.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Energy-efficient main door that aligns with Vastu principles, allowing natural light to enter the entrance area.

openings.name: Service Entry
openings.description: Dedicated service entrance for staff, designed to be secure and functional while ensuring minimal energy consumption.

openings.name: Living Room Windows
openings.description: Large windows that ensure ample natural light in the living room, adhering to sustainable design practices.

openings.name: Balcony Windows
openings.description: Balcony windows that provide cross ventilation and enhance the connection with the garden while maintaining energy efficiency.

garden.description: A large eco-friendly garden area integrating native plant species, water-efficient landscaping, and natural lighting, ensuring a serene environment in accordance with Vastu principles for balanced energy.
